original_definition: 'Placing on the market' means making a product available for the first time on the Community market with a view to its distribution or use within the Community, whether for reward or free of charge and irrespective of the selling technique;
generated_definition: 'Placing on the market' means placing on the market and/or putting into service of a product or service in the european economic area, which is subject to eu legislation.

Article 2: ‘Placing on the market’ means making a product available for the first time on the Community market with a view to its distribution or use within the Community, whether for reward or free of charge and irrespective of the selling technique;
Article 3: Placing on the market and/or putting into service
